full_summary:
# Treasury and Investment Advisory Services - 2024 Refresh

## Tender Details

### RFSA Number

* RFSA #2021-3042-2024 [1]

### Closing Date

* Tender closing date: June 10, 2024, at 14:00:00 [2]
* Note: This tender has expired.

### Description

The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) is seeking to establish additional Supply Arrangements for the provision of Treasury and Investment Advisory Services for any one or both of the following two (2) Service Streams:

1. Ex Ante Funding and Loss Absorbency
2. Investments and Sources of Liquidity

## Service Categories

* Risk management consultation service
* Treasury services
* Banking and investment
* Investment analysis

## Procurement Information

* Procurement category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods

## Contract Details

* Contracting entity: Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC)
* Address: 50 O'Connor St., 17th floor, Ottawa, ON, K1P 6L2, Canada
* Telephone: (613) 850-8893
